title: Determining the enabling factors for implementing cloud data governance in the Saudi public sector by structural equation modelling
research_description: This study identifies enabling factors for implementing cloud data governance in the Saudi public sector using structural equation modelling.
research_results: The study identifies the main enablers for successful cloud data governance in the Saudi public sector, including preparation requirements, data governance functions, and monitoring mechanisms.
future_research: Future research could explore cloud data governance in other national contexts and examine long-term sustainability.
